meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christian Maher Pamela Stewart Carter Spires Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7278.

td.p: Christian Maher, a fishmonger from Sea Isle City, New Jersey
Pamela Stewart, an art historian and college professor from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Carter Spires, a law student originally from Birmingham, Alabama (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,001)

tr.td: POTPOURRI
(Alex: Little bit of everything.)
A MIXED BAG
(Alex: A little bit of everything.)
RANDOMNESS IN SCIENCE
(Alex: A little bit of everything, I guess.)
LITERARY MISCELLANIES
(Alex: I won't repeat myself.)
HODGE-POD
"E-T-C"
(Alex: Those three letters will come up in that order, but not necessarily together, in each correct response.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Lift your spirits with potpourri that contains these leaves, a mainstay of koalas')

tr.td: Lift your spirits with potpourri that contains these leaves, a mainstay of koalas

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: The hotel was the site of the famous Roundtable Lunches where some famous people would, uh, exercise their brilliant wits.)
...
(Alex: We\'re talking about the famous [*], and the Roundtable Lunches with Benchley and Dorothy Parker.)
ChristianWhat is the Chelsea?
$7,599
CarterWhat is the Bellagio?
$5,001
PamelaWhat is the Savoy
$8,401
the Algonquin Hotel')

Carter
Pamela
Christian

2nd place: $2,000

Pamela
Christian

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
